title: San Diego/Mission Beach-Pacific Beach
name: Sinbad’s
content: For an alternative to drinking, why not try smoking? Although they serve beer, the specialty at is hookah smoking. Their menu includes 30 different flavors of premium hookah tobacco. Relax on the front porch with a hookah and watch all the passer-bys. Since it’s not technically a bar, you only have to be 18 to enjoy a toke. It’s also open after all the bars close on weekends –till 4am.
